SnippetsTable.Name: Gray block
SnippetsTable.SnippetCode: \tikzstyle{gray_block} = [draw,outer sep=7,inner sep=7,minimum size=57,line width=1, very thick, draw=black!55, top color=white,bottom color=black!20]

SnippetsTable.Name: Green circle
SnippetsTable.SnippetCode: \tikzstyle{green_circle} = [ font={\huge\bfseries}, shape=circle, minimum size=0.5cm, circular drop shadow, text=black, very thick, draw=black!55, top color=white,bottom color=green!80, text width=0.5cm, align=center]

SnippetsTable.Name: NOPREVIEW
SnippetsTable.Description:
Prevent TikzEdt from inserting \PreviewEnvironment command.
Insert at head of document.

SnippetsTable.Name: STANDALONE
SnippetsTable.Description:
Tell TikzEdt that this document is standalone if not detected automatically. Document is compiled as is. This option is useful if the \begin{document} command is included via an input file.
Insert at head of document.
